Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for row and column location

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location(int row, int col)
      Creates a new location from the specified row and column
